The claim originated from a meme on the: Interesting Facts" page of the IHatePeacocks2.com website in August 2014, which is known for posting humorous but incorrect claims.
The meme itself is part of a collection: indicating that it should not be considered a factual statement.
The 1972 Andes flight disaster did occur: and some survivors did resort to cannibalism to survive. However, none of the survivors carried the name "Lincoln" or had any connection to the actor Andrew Lincoln's family name (Clutterbuck).
Profiles of the actor Andrew Lincoln men: but none of them mention any connection to the 1972 Andes flight disaster. This further disproves the claim made in the meme.
